Deities @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.deities.Arshea]{Arshea}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.deities.Balumbdar]{Balumbdar}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.deities.Casandalee]{Casandalee}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.deities.Gruhastha]{Gruhastha}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.deities.Irori]{Irori}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.deities.Mazludeh]{Mazludeh}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.deities.Narriseminek]{Narriseminek}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.deities.Otolmens]{Otolmens}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.deities.Pillars of Knowledge]{Pillars of Knowledge}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.deities.Ragdya]{Ragdya}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.deities.Shei]{Shei}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.deities.Shizuru]{Shizuru}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.deities.The Godclaw]{The Godclaw}

Domain Spell @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Perfected Mind]{Perfected Mind}; Advanced Domain Spell @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Perfected Form]{Perfected Form}

You strive to perfect your mind, body, and spirit.
name: Perfection Domain
